alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lafayette, southeastern Evangeline, northeastern Acadia, western St. Martin and southwestern St. Landry Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chataignier to near Carencro. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Opelousas, Eunice, Scott, Carencro, Church Point, Mamou, Sunset, Grand Coteau, Cankton, Chataignier, Prairie Ronde, Mire, Savoy, Lawtell, Swords, Richard and Reddell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 96 and 108. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Evangeline; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
